title: 16xypjnxlrew

content: [Hi! If you see a warning at the top of the topic, know this is a false accusation of scam, using his authority LoyceV with his friends created this false flag, more about the situation here - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406606.0I ask everyone who is not indifferent to the situation to press the button "Oppose" -https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3009 ]LIMITED OFFER has ENDEDHi! I need a loan of $100 for 30 daysLoan purpose: personalPayment: $105Type of Collateral: NONETRX address: TWBLAWLuPs7qzwqMajLgcc5jxyjVGTiUkB

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: This kind of request tends to bring you more red trust than getting you a loan. You should have been reading the sticky post. There's literally no good reason anybody would give you that money as lending (maybe as donation, heh)...My advise is to remove or lock this topic.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: $4.58 x 24 months is $109.92I don't think there's a dumb person who want to lend his money for 24 months to earn $9.92, even you're live in poor country, you can earn $9.92 in just a week for working on real life job. More importantly, you don't have any reputation and asking for non collateral loan.

More importantly, you don't have any reputation and asking for non collateral loan.I have a collateral (100 UST), but no one wants to take it

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 30, 2022, 02:25:16 PMI have a collateral (100 UST), but no one wants to take itYou're a liar and cheater, and this has become obvious now that you're looking to scam some one.  You keep saying you have collateral, and trying to make is sound like your collateral is worth $100, but it's actually worth less than $1.Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 26, 2022, 02:28:49 PMWhat collateral is valid? Is 100 US Terra ok?US Terra is a worthless shitcoin, and all your attempts to make it sound like you have collateral just earned you a red-tag.  Good job.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on June 30, 2022, 03:56:56 PMYou're a liar and cheater, and this has become obvious now that you're looking to scam some one.  You keep saying you have collateral, and trying to make is sound like your collateral is worth $100, but it's actually worth less than $1.US Terra is a worthless shitcoin, and all your attempts to make it sound like you have collateral just earned you a red-tag.  Good job.Are you aware that UST went up to 10 (TEN) cents yesterday? What will the smart guy say? Very very soon UST will be $1 again. What are you writing and writing here? STOP terrorizing everyone with your red flags. Leave me alone.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 30, 2022, 05:14:35 PMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on June 30, 2022, 03:56:56 PMYou're a liar and cheater, and this has become obvious now that you're looking to scam some one.  You keep saying you have collateral, and trying to make is sound like your collateral is worth $100, but it's actually worth less than $1.US Terra is a worthless shitcoin, and all your attempts to make it sound like you have collateral just earned you a red-tag.  Good job.Are you aware that UST went up to 10 (TEN) cents yesterday? What will the smart guy say? Very very soon UST will be $1 again. What are you writing and writing here? STOP terrorizing everyone with your red flags. Leave me alone.What about today?  It's back down to 5¢.  So yesterday you were asking for a $100 loan with only $10 worth of collateral, and today you're asking for $100 loan with only $5 worth of collateral.   My bad, but I still don't see how that is that supposed to make you any less of a scammer.  You still get to keep your terror-filled red-tag, at least until you stop spamming the lending board with your retarded scam attempts.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on July 22, 2022, 06:42:08 AMLoan search, "limited offer" . Give loan, never pay back.Yes, I'm looking for a loan and what's wrong with that? I include a "Limited Offer" only occasionally when the loan will be paid almost instantly. The regular offer is almost always valid. You gave me a loan to says that I would never repay it? The answer is NO! So stop posting and posting here. Write only when you decide to give me a loan!

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: You are looking for a loan for 3 months now, if you would have been able to pay it back you would not need the loan by now. But since there is no money coming in there will also be no repayment.

But since there is no money coming in there will also be no repayment.I am looking for a loan on the advice of Robert Kiyosaki. Have you read his book? So he was a homeless man and slept on the street with his wife, and did not work. When asked why his don't work? He boldly answered I am looking for a loan. In the end, he found this loan and became a billionaire

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on July 25, 2022, 11:30:14 AMI am looking for a loan on the advice of Robert Kiyosaki. Have you read his book? So he was a homeless man and slept on the street with his wife, and did not work. When asked why his don't work? He boldly answered I am looking for a loan. In the end, he found this loan and became a billionaireLol, so you're trying to get a loan by informing us that you want to emulate yourself after well known scammer?  Robert Kiyosaki is a lying piece of shit who preys on the insecure, the lazy, and the greedy.  Not to mention, the story you relayed sounds like utter bullshit, and probably one his many lies.Quote from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_KiyosakiIn 2010, the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation did an exposé on scams that were being perpetuated by Kiyosaki's company in Canada in the guise of seminars. Upon tracking the success claims of "Rich Dad" seminar organizers, they discovered that these claims were not true. Investments in trailers and trailer parks, which were being propagated as "successful" by seminar teachers, were found to actually be barren pieces of land that no one was using.I think it's high time you come to grip with reality; you're never going to get a loan from this site.  And, it's no one's fault but your own.  If you had put as much effort into contributing to this forum as you've put into trolling it, maybe someone would have taken a chance on giving you a $100 loan.  But, it's pretty obvious that ship has sailed.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 25, 2022, 06:15:52 PMLol, so you're trying to get a loan by informing us that you want to emulate yourself after well known scammer?  Robert Kiyosaki is a lying piece of shit who preys on the insecure, the lazy, and the greedy.  Not to mention, the story you relayed sounds like utter bullshit, and probably one his many lies.Quote from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_KiyosakiIn 2010, the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation did an exposé on scams that were being perpetuated by Kiyosaki's company in Canada in the guise of seminars. Upon tracking the success claims of "Rich Dad" seminar organizers, they discovered that these claims were not true. Investments in trailers and trailer parks, which were being propagated as "successful" by seminar teachers, were found to actually be barren pieces of land that no one was using.I think it's high time you come to grip with reality; you're never going to get a loan from this site.  And, it's no one's fault but your own.  If you had put as much effort into contributing to this forum as you've put into trolling it, maybe someone would have taken a chance on giving you a $100 loan.  But, it's pretty obvious that ship has sailed.I also read about this accusation of Robert of lying, but he thought that his employees slandered him because he refused to raise their wages, just as I was slandered in a non-existent scam by users of this forum abusing their authority. Do you think it's true?I still hope that there are sane users on the forum who, after reading all these red and yellow flags, will suddenly understand that I was accused of a non-existent scam, even after I announced to everyone that the UST exchange is no longer available. But after reading the topics in the loan thread, alas, I fall into despair, because all the topics have died
